resources.string: Some APIs return number as the result, such as 1 for Advertising and 2 for Scam. They can be mapped to human readable texts.

After blocking a call, also block subsequent calls that bypass all rules for a period.

Use case:
  Some spammers use numbers with common prefixes, which can be blocked with regex rules. After the first call being blocked, they will switch to random numbers, making calls that may bypass all rules.

Note:
This also involves the risk of blocking a valid call, it\'s a trade-off.

This will create both a regex rule and a workflow, see the tooltip of inner action Call Throttling for a detailed explanation.

What it does is switching the default behavior from allow by default to block by default for a period, using a temporarily activated regex rule that blocks all calls.

A typical setup includes:
  - A number regex rule that blocks SMS for a particular number or contact group, it\'s disabled and will be activated on the fly.
  - An Call Throttling workflow.

Options:

- Duration
Calls will be blocked during this period (in seconds).

- Including Blocked
This feature will be activated after any call is blocked.

- Including Answered
- Minimal Call Duration
This feature will be activated after a call is answered but the call duration is too short, as such a call is also considered a spam call.

Mute consecutive SMS notifications from the same number for a period.

Use cases:
Allow the first three notifications from a number and mute the rest within a minute.

This will create both a regex rule and a workflow, see the tooltip of inner action SMS Throttling for a detailed explanation.

Mute consecutive SMS notifications from the same number for a period.

A typical setup includes:
  - A number regex rule that blocks all numbers, it\'s disabled and will be activated on the fly.
  - An SMS Throttling workflow.

Options:

- Duration
SMS messages will be blocked during this period (in seconds).

- Count Limit
Allow first N notifications.

- Including Answered
- Minimal Call Duration
If an answered call is too short, it\'s also considered a spam call and will activate this feature.
